data.eml:eml: A cybertaxonomic revision of the micro-landsnail genus Plectostoma Adam (Mollusca, Caenogastropoda, Diplommatinidae), from Peninsular Malaysia, Sumatra and Indochina

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liew, Thor-Seng, Vermeulen, Jaap Jan, Marzuki, Mohammad Effendi bin, Schilthuizen, Menno (2014): A cybertaxonomic revision of the micro-landsnail genus Plectostoma Adam (Mollusca, Caenogastropoda, Diplommatinidae), from Peninsular Malaysia, Sumatra and Indochina. ZooKeys 393: 1-107, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.393.6717, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.393.6717
